    Biography

    I am a graduate student in the Department of Mechanical and Aerspace Engineering (MAE) at The Ohio State University, advised by Prof. Bilin Aksun Guvenc. I am passionate about Autonomous Vehicles, and their applications in shaping the transportation of our future.

    Interests

    • Autonomous Vehicles
    • Optimal Control
    • State Estimation
    • Path Planning

    Education

    • MS in ECE, 2018

      The Ohio State University

    • B.Tech in Electrical Engineering, 2015

      Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad
